name: Mike Borgia TOP (specify your size in paypal notes)
Blood and Moonlight
description: Debut release from Mike Borgia. This CD showcases the talent that was later to evolve and create an even better songwriting performer. With a fantastic mix of acoustic and full band tracks, this album is a wonderful beginning to a brilliant musical journey. With deep and personal lyrics and a soft feel its a must for any Mike Borgia collection. 1. Where You Are 2. You Were Something 3. Calling Me 4. All You Do 5. Tracy’s Blood 6. Accused 7. Right Away 8. Greenlight 9. Find My Way 10. Returning The Notion 11. See You In The Next Life WHILE STOCKS LAST: If you order this CD you will recieve a free copy of the eclectic 6 track side project E.P – Bitch Cassidy “The Gift and The Sickness”.

name: You Are What You Hate
description: This 2004 release showcases a mature and rockier sound that fans have come to expect from Mike Borgia. With his trademark songwriting skills and hooks that capture even the most passive listenier, this album is something that will inspire you and keep you coming back for more. 1. All You Do (drink your life away) 2. Wake Up 3. Can’t Give 4. Have You Ever 5. Angels Falling Over 6. Leaving 7. Crystal Eyes 8. Get Out 9. Thrown WHILE STOCKS LAST: If you order this CD you will recieve a free copy of the eclectic 6 track side project E.P – Bitch Cassidy “The Gift and The Sickness”.

name: Issues To Egos (digital download card)
description: Fantastic 5th album from US sensation Mike Borgia. This album is his best yet and features 10 brilliant tracks with hooks that will keep listening and singing them for days. Physical CD’s SOLD OUT! This is a Digital Download Card in stock Track listing: 1. Let You Down 2. I Dont Have Time For You 3. When The Bombs Come 4. Boiling Hot Water 5. Blood and Moonlight 6. Issues To Egos 7. Misplaced 8. This Is Not A Song 9. Like Cement On A Summers Day 10. A Journal (Write it down) visit MIKEBORGIA.COM for other outlets WHILE STOCKS LAST: If you order this CD you will recieve a free copy of the eclectic 6 track side project E.P – Bitch Cassidy “The Gift and The Sickness”.

name: Lost Without You (limited edition acoustic ep)
description: Amazing limited edition acoustic EP. Previously only available at live shows this is one of the only places you can get a copy of this online. Featuring re-recorded versions of some of Mike Borgias most memorable and fan favourite songs and with limited edition artwork, its an absolute must for any music lover. Hurry and pick up a copy before its gone forever. WHILE STOCKS LAST: Free badge mini set when you order this CD.
